title: Question:
author: Micha12345
content: You are our hope: help the Armed Forces in their struggle for the freedom of Ukraine!To all people who are worried about the future of Ukraine and feel responsible for the fate of our country, we offer to help the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The Ukrainian military are people who are forced to respond to the aggression of the Russian Federation and defend their country.  They perform dangerous and difficult work at the front without being able to return to their families every day. Almost every citizen of the world has the opportunity to support Ukraine and prevent the actions of the aggressor of the Russian Federation, if they join the assistance of the Armed Forces.  It can be a small donation equivalent to even 2 dollars, a large amount we will collect the necessary amount of money can be sent to these addressesBTC - bc1qjejrqtyln9ghyjsy0q5psfeeu59l8hdmkt500qUSDTERC-20 - 0x9d7859b586670EB5a42fb56a54B6Bd8d08B4c48eTRC-20 - TY2vKXNwEodfipa4SPkBqsT1tKqyA3tKDrBCH - bitcoincash:qp4nzva3qnselk0tdyzugk8m5pxerhqf9sknuydl0qETH - 0x9d7859b586670EB5a42fb56a54B6Bd8d08B4c48eNow we are collecting funds for a radio station with walkie-talkies, the communication of which cannot be silenced by the enemy, I will send a report on their purchase to all forums. In this difficult time, we need to show our solidarity and responsibility.  Offer your help to the Armed Forces of Ukraine and support our soldiers who risk their lives every day for our country and the future of our children. May God bless Ukraine and our military.  Thank you for your help!

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Ukraine will never have freedom until the government and military of Ukraine stop persecuting and killing Ukrainians who are in favor of Russia. You want freedom? Stop taking it away from those among you who want freedom to interact with Russia in fair trade and friendship.At this stage of Ukrainian leaders' stupidity, it will be almost impossible to do this. The best chance you have is to stop taking orders from the US and Nato, and expel them from Ukraine instead.

comments.author: Micha12345
comments.body: You are not from Ukraine.  You accept the information that is presented to you, come here and count those people from Ukraine who are supporters of the Russian Federation, but the condition is that weapons should not be directed at them, look at the city of Mariupol, why rejoice there?  There people praise Russia for the fact that they bombed the city and sleep in winter without windows in the house, you are the one who speaks for such freedom for Ukrainians.  Do you want to live like this yourself?
